examples.example: 我真诚地请求您能给予我一些建议和帮助。

translate.english: I sincerely request that you can give me some advice and help.

examples.example: 我鼓起勇气向老师请求参加这次重要的活动。

translate.english: I summoned up the courage to ask the teacher to participate in this important activity.

examples.example: 我礼貌地请求他帮我个小忙，他很爽快地就答应了。

translate.english: I politely asked him to do me a small favor, and he readily agreed.
